screen1.title: Welcome to OK-Snap Group Buy
screen1.description: Join your community to save money on Korean groceries and products through group purchases.
screen1.details: Connect with neighbors and get better prices together.

screen2.title: Save Money, Join Locals
screen2.description: Group buys help you get bulk pricing on items you love.
screen2.details: Post errands to get help with tasks or help others in your community.

screen3.title: One App for Your Community
screen3.description: Everything you need in one place: group buys, errands, and community connections.
screen3.details: Track your savings, earnings, and community impact.

screen4.title: Let's Get Started
screen4.details: Sign up to start saving and connecting with neighbors.

hero.title: Connect, Shop, & Save Together
hero.description: Join group buys, request errands, and build a stronger Korean community in your area.

auth.name: Name
auth.signUpToAccess: Create an account to access this feature and join our community.
auth.googleSignInFailed: Google sign in failed. Please check if Google OAuth is enabled in your Supabase project.
auth.checkEmailVerification: Account created successfully! Please check your email for verification before signing in.

groupBuy.productTitleHelp: Give your product a clear, descriptive name
groupBuy.pricePerUnitHelp: How much does one unit cost?
groupBuy.descriptionHelp: Tell people what makes this product special
groupBuy.targetQuantity: How many do you need to sell?
groupBuy.targetQuantityHelp: The minimum number of items needed for this group purchase to succeed
groupBuy.deadlineHelp: The last day people can join this group purchase
groupBuy.locationHelp: Adding a location helps users find your group buy on the map
groupBuy.vendorRoleRequired: To start a group purchase, you'll need to set up a seller account.
groupBuy.signUpToCreate: Create an account to start group purchases
groupBuy.vendorRoleDescription: To start organizing group purchases for your community, you'll need a seller account. This lets you create listings and manage orders.

errand.title: What do you need help with?
errand.titleHelp: Give your request a clear title
errand.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what you need help with...
errand.descriptionHelp: Tell helpers what you need and when
errand.budgetHelp: The amount you're willing to pay for this task
errand.deadline: When do you need this done?
errand.deadlineHelp: The latest date you need this completed
errand.postSuccess: Your request is live! Helpers in your area can now see it and offer to help.
errand.postError: Failed to post errand. Please try again.
errand.signInToPost: Please sign in to ask for help
errand.signUpToPost: Create an account to ask for help

dashboard.subtitle: See your orders, savings, and what you're helping with
dashboard.totalSavingsHelp: Money you've saved by joining group purchases
dashboard.totalEarningsHelp: Money you've earned from helping others

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences
profile.helperVerification: Complete your helper verification to start accepting errands.
profile.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all app data? This cannot be undone.

roleAcquisition.title: Available Roles
roleAcquisition.subtitle: Request roles to unlock additional features. You can have multiple roles.
roleAcquisition.vendorDescription: Create and manage group buys for your community.
roleAcquisition.helperDescription: Help community members with errands and tasks.
roleAcquisition.customerDescription: Join group buys and post errands.
roleAcquisition.confirmRequestMessage: Are you sure you want to request this role?
roleAcquisition.confirmRequestNote: This will add the role to your account. You can remove it later if needed.
roleAcquisition.confirmRemoveMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this role?
roleAcquisition.confirmRemoveWarning: You will lose access to features associated with this role.

emptyState.signUpToGetStarted: Create an account to get started
emptyState.earlyAccessMarketplace: We're building this together. Group purchases let you save money by buying together with neighbors. Listings will appear as sellers join and create group purchases for your region.
emptyState.vendorNoGroupBuys: You haven't started any group purchases yet. As an early seller, you'll help build this community marketplace. Start your first listing to get going.
emptyState.customerNoGroupBuys: No group purchases are available in your region yet. Group purchases let you save money by buying together with neighbors. We're adding sellers now, and listings will appear here as they join. Check back soon or see what's available in other regions.
emptyState.customerNoErrands: You haven't asked for help yet. Post your first request to connect with verified helpers in your community.
emptyState.noErrandsYet: No errands are available yet. This is a new community, and requests will appear as members ask for help. Be among the first to post.
emptyState.noOrdersYet: You haven't joined any group purchases yet. See what's available to find group purchases in your region.
emptyState.noChatsYet: You don't have any active chats yet. Join a group purchase or errand to start conversations with sellers and helpers.
emptyState.noCreditHistoryYet: You haven't earned any credits yet. Join group purchases and complete errands to start earning credits.
emptyState.vendorNoBatches: You haven't created any regional batches yet. Create batches for different regions to expand your reach.
emptyState.customerNoBatches: No batches are available for this listing yet. The seller may be setting up regional options. Check back soon.
emptyState.joinGroupBuyOrErrand: Join a group purchase or errand

marketplace.title: Regional Marketplace
marketplace.description: Find bulk deals by region, price, and delivery method

orders.title: Vendor Orders
orders.willAppear: Orders will appear here once customers place orders for your listings.
orders.fulfilledError: Failed to mark order as fulfilled

regionalBatch.batchCancelled: Batch cancelled successfully. Orders flagged for refund.
regionalBatch.batchActivated: Batch activated successfully! It is now accepting orders.
regionalBatch.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

chat.noMessages: No messages yet. Start the conversation!

regionSelector.noBatchesAvailable: No regional batches available for this listing.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language. Changes apply immediately.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

errors.fixErrors: Please fix the errors in the form

checkout.testModeDescription: You are in test mode. No real payments will be processed. This is for development and testing only.

guestZeroState.whatYouGet: What you get by joining early:
guestZeroState.notifyWhenAvailable: We'll notify you when group purchases become available in your region.
guestZeroState.completeProfile: Complete your profile setup to see role-specific options.

browse.title: We're Building This Together
browse.whyEmpty: We're curating the best sellers and building an exclusive community marketplace.
browse.whatYouGet: Priority access to new listings, exclusive early-bird pricing, and first-to-know notifications when your area launches.
browse.whatNext: Sellers are joining now, and listings will appear here as they complete setup. Check back soon or create an account to be notified.

groupBuys.title: We're Building This Together
groupBuys.whyEmpty: We're curating quality sellers and building an exclusive group purchase community.
groupBuys.whatYouGet: Priority access to new group purchases, exclusive early-bird pricing, and first-to-know notifications when listings launch in your region.
groupBuys.whatNext: Sellers are completing setup now. Group purchases will appear here as they create listings for your area. Join early to be among the first to access deals.

errands.title: Community Errands Coming Soon
errands.whyEmpty: We're building a trusted network of verified helpers and connecting neighbors.
errands.whatYouGet: Early access to ask for help, priority matching with verified helpers, and exclusive rates before public launch.
errands.whatNext: The errand network is growing. As more community members join, you'll be able to ask for help and get assistance from verified helpers in your area.

guestEarlyAccess.title: Early Access Preview
guestEarlyAccess.description: You're browsing in guest mode. Sign up to access full features including creating group buys, posting errands, viewing analytics, and managing your account.
guestEarlyAccess.dashboardDescription: Create an account to track your activity, manage orders, and access all features.
guestEarlyAccess.profileDescription: Create an account to manage your settings, view credits and referrals, and access your order history.

earlyAccess.title: Join Early Access
earlyAccess.description: Join our early access waitlist to be notified when group buys and errands become available in your area.
earlyAccess.waitlistDescription: Get notified when services launch in your area. No account required.
earlyAccess.fullAccessDescription: Create an account to join group buys, post errands, and access all features immediately.
earlyAccess.waitlistJoined: You're on the list! We'll notify you when early access is available.
earlyAccess.joinFailed: Failed to join waitlist. Please try again.
earlyAccess.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
earlyAccess.privacy: We'll only use your email to notify you about early access. Unsubscribe anytime.

signupChoice.earlyAccessDesc: Join waitlist to be notified when services launch in your area
signupChoice.fullAccessDesc: Create account to start using all features immediately

referral.howItWorksDescription: Share your referral link with friends. When they sign up and make their first order, you both earn credits!
referral.onlyForRegistered: Referral codes are only available for registered users. Please sign up to generate and share your referral code.

startPage.joinDescription: Join group buys, request errands, and build a stronger Korean community in your area.
startPage.groupBuysDescription: Join collective purchases and save money by buying in bulk with your community.
startPage.errandsDescription: Request help with tasks or offer your services to the community.
startPage.connectDescription: Connect with Korean community members in your area. Together we can save money, help each other, and build a stronger community.

browsePage.browseSubtitle: Find group purchases and errand requests from your community
browsePage.discoverCommunity: Discover what the community is organizing right now.
browsePage.noFeaturedMatchFilters: No featured group purchases match your filters

groupBuysPage.findBulkDeals: Find bulk deals in your area
groupBuysPage.failedToLoadListings: Failed to load listings. Please try again.
groupBuysPage.pleaseSignInToOrder: Please sign in to place an order

permissionDenied.title: Access Denied
permissionDenied.defaultMessage: You don't have permission to access this feature.
permissionDenied.vendorRoleRequired: To start a group purchase, you'll need to set up a seller account.
permissionDenied.customerRoleRequired: To join group purchases, you'll need to create an account.
permissionDenied.helperRoleRequired: To help with errands, you'll need to set up a helper account.
permissionDenied.loginToContinue: Please create an account or sign in to continue.

checkout.adBlockerMessage: It looks like your ad blocker is preventing our payment system from loading. To complete your purchase:
checkout.adBlockerStep1: Disable your ad blocker temporarily, or
checkout.adBlockerStep2: Add our site to your ad blocker's allowlist, or
checkout.adBlockerStep3: Use credits to complete your order (if available)
checkout.failedToInitializePaymentRetry: Failed to initialize payment. Please try again.
checkout.paymentHeldSecurely: üí≥ Your payment is safely held until your order is ready. You'll only be charged when the group purchase succeeds.
checkout.testModeDescription: You are in test mode. No real payments will be processed. This is for development and testing only.
checkout.securePaymentDescription: Your payment information is encrypted and processed securely by Stripe. We never store your card details.

errand.deadlineCannotBePast: Deadline cannot be in the past
